title: Chapter 374: Chojo Kebutsu
body:
Chapter 374: Chojo Kebutsu

Chojo Kebutsu (Lit. Peak Transformed Buddha)


“Take a look at my strongest state.” Ren Tianyou standing on the head of that giant Buddha, whose body was completely covered with his Susanoo armor, had his palms put together, and similarly the giant Buddha was also maintaining the action of putting the palms together. And after the head of this giant Buddha was covered with Susanoo helmet, he said, “This is my strongest state after combining my Full Body Susanoo and Sage Art—-True Thousand Hands, Heavenly Buddha Descend!”


Sage Art—-True Thousand Hands, is wood style’s supreme secret technique, can instantly form a nearly 100 meters Thousand Hands Giant Buddha. And now Ren Tianyou had used his Susanoo as the armor for this giant Buddha, which not only greatly increased its already great defensive power, but also sharply increased its attack power. And this was also Ren Tainyou’s final means to rely on.


“Go!” Under the control of Ren Tianyou, this giant Buddha rushed towards distant Yaorao’s Demonic Buddha.


Soon these two giants collided, and without any means and without any skill, they only used most direct physical power to collide. With two giants reaching nearly 100 meters directly meeting force with force and colliding with each other, a powerful impact force spread all around with these giants as the center.


“Ka ka” A loud shattering sound resounded, and a huge and long fissure densely covered the ground around.


And the arms of Demonic Buddha of Yaorao and Ren Tianyou’s Heavenly Buddha firmly held each other’s hands. Both of these giant Buddha were unceasingly emitting power, wanting to rely on their power to overwhelm other side.


“Humph, overestimating your capability!” Looking at Ren Tianyou standing on the head of giant Buddha, Yaorao standing within Demonic Buddha coldly snorted and sneered appeared on her mouth. Shortly afterwards, she made hand signs, and purple colored sigil flew out from her hands, then a huge purple colored halo appeared behind Demonic Buddha.


Along with the appearance of this purple colored sigil, suddenly a loud sound as if Heavenly Buddha was singing sound resounded between the heaven and earth, seemingly only this sound was remained under the entire sky.


And at the same time, behind this Demonic Buddha, suddenly a nearly 200 meters huge statue of Buddha sitting cross-legged with purple colored radiance flashing around it appeared, and this statue of Buddha stretched out its huge right hand. In front of this suddenly appeared energy purple colored statue of Buddha, Ren Tianyou’s that giant True Thousand Hands however looked like a child.


“Demon Moves the Mountain and Rivers!”


With the explosive shout of Yaorao inside Demonic Buddha, that heaven concealing huge right hand of that huge Buddha behind her swatted towards Ren Tianyou.


Under this heaven concealing huge hand, Ren Tianyou felt great sense of pressure, as if he was not facing a person rather the heaven, and he felt that he was incapable of stopping this move. Now he felt that his strength which he was intensely proud of was really too insignificant in front of Yaorao’s this absolute strength.


But at this time, in the brain of Ren Tianyou appeared a scene of how he got together with Little Yu with great difficulty, and with her weak and tender disposition, if he died then what would she do? Moreover his elders sister Yue’er who was resurrected with great difficulty, how sad she would be if he died? Furthermore there were still White Tiger and others, his life and death companions.


And finally appeared the scene of, when all nine tailed-beasts were swallowed by Gedo Statue, all of them resolutely saying those words to him.


“You must win!”


Ren Tianyou slowly raised his hand, and looked towards that heaven concealing hand that had already covered the entire sky above him, he recalled the sacrifice of nine tailed-beasts for him, then the fighting will slowly ignited again in his heart.


Thinking this, Ren Tianyou gathered all the chakra within his body, then quickly made a series of hand seals. And at the same time, his Rinnegan also emitted large amount of eye power, and the surrounding Susanoo glimmered with purple colored lightning.


“Senpo—-Chojo Kebutsu!”


After Ren Tianyou finished making hand seals, he placed his palms together, then shouted loudly.


Along with the completion of ninjutsu, the eyes of giant Buddha suddenly flashed with bright radiance as if alive. After that those thousand hands behind giant Buddha moved, and with all hands changing into fists, they punched towards those huge hand in the sky.


‘Hong’, ‘hong’, ‘hong’……a series of loud sound resounded. Countless arms hit the giant hand above, issuing a thunderous sound. And under the grand power of that heaven concealing hand, countless arms also broke and changing into wood, they fell down. But even more hands would replace those broken ones to punch towards that huge hand.


Under the attack of Chojo Kebutsu combined with the power of Ren Tianyou’s Susanoo, the attack power of this giant hand was finally depleted, and slowly dissipated in the air. Moreover that huge statue of Buddha behind Yaorao also disappeared slowly.


“Huhu!” After seeing that huge hand had disappeared, the complexion of Ren Tianyou loosened, and he fell down to one knee on the head of giant Buddha, then began breathing heavily, while unceasingly shouting loudly in his heart, “Finally stopped, Shukaku, Kuruma, I didn’t disappoint your expectation. I will definitely win this fight.”


“It seems I still underestimated you.” Looking at heavily breathing Ren Tianyou, Yaorao standing within Demonic Buddha slowly said. But seeing that incomparably dim Susanoo around the huge body of giant Buddha, a sneer appeared on her face, “But do you still have the ability to stop my attacks again? Now let me split open your tortoise shell, and send you to meet Death God, then I will retrieve the thing that should originally belongs to me from your corpse.”


Finished speaking, Demonic Buddha’s right hand slowly raised Void Slaying Sword which was emitting powerful sword light, and under the control of Yaorao, it chopped down. With the space in front of this sword breaking into pieces, it directly chopped down towards Ren Tianyou’s giant Buddha.


With a ‘hong’ loud explosion sound, the Susanoo armor was instantly shattered, and the giant Buddha created by True Thousand Hands also was chopped into by this sword. Then changing into pieces of woods, they rained down from the sky. As for Ren Tianyou, under Rinnegan’s remaining eye power, he used Baleful Transposition to instantly land on the distant ground.


“What other means do you have now?” After splitting open the last defense of Ren Tianyou, Yaorao standing within Demonic Buddha indifferently looked at Ren Tianyou, and slowly raising Void Slaying Sword once again, she said, “In front of absolute strength, any of your stratagem will not ensure success, now you no longer have a chance, just go and report to Death God, that old man.”


“Is that so?” Ren Tianyou slowly stood up from the ground. Even though he was wounded all over, he still had a smile on his face, “Time has come, it’s time to draw a full stop to this battle.”


Along with the voice of Ren Tianyou, Uchiha flame formation was shattered with a bang. And with a huge sound of explosion of barrier breaking resounding throughout the horizon, and a huge dusts and smokes rose.


“This is……?” The eyes of Yaorao standing within Demonic Buddha flashed with purple radiances. Just now in the midst of explosion dusts and smokes, she had indistinctly seen a huge figure.


“It’s time to end everything.” Looking at the center of the explosion, the Rinnegan of Ren Tianyou who was standing far away shone, then he rushed towards the center of explosion without any hesitation.
